thread.title: Redesigned Esperanza resort opens in Los Cabos

author: Jeanne Cooper
title: Redesigned Esperanza resort opens in Los Cabos
text: Redesigned Esperanza resort opens in Los Cabos Jeanne Coope , San Francisco Chronicle By Jeanne Cooper Published 3:39 pm, Thursday, August 13, 2015 Participants on Ciclismo Classico's new culinary cycling tour of Italy's Piedmont region can sample varietals such as Barolo, Barbera and Barbaresco. Photo: Ciclismo Classico Participants on Ciclismo Classico's new culinary cycling tour of... One of Los Cabos’ most luxurious hotels, the 57-room Esperanza, an Auberge Resort, has reopened with redesigned guestrooms among other new features.
